Package propra.imageconverter.imageheader

Class ImageHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • propra.imageconverter.imageheader.ImageHeader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class ImageHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for Images.

      • ImageHeader

        public ImageHeader​(short imgWidth,
                   short imgHeight,
                   byte pixelDepth)
            throws InvalidImageException
        Constructs an Image with width, height, pixelDepth and pixel data of that image.
        Parameters:
        imgWidth - width of image.
        imgHeight - height of image.
        pixelDepth - pixel depth.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if the image header is invalid
